p: Secondary structure analysis for Nsp13 helicase enzymes shows that 17.64%, 26.29% and 56.07% of residues are present in alpha helix, extended strand and random coil respectively (Suppl. Table 1). In the case of Nsp14 protein, 13.85%, 29.79% and 56.36% of residues are present in alpha helix, extended strand and random coil respectively.
